content.text:
# Draft:Epic Videos of Bangladesh July Revolution 2024

VIDEO HISTORY OF BANGLADESH JULY REVOLUTION 2024
Video history is vital for understanding the Bangladesh July Revolution of 2024 because it preserves authentic, visual evidence of events that written reports alone cannot capture. A significant feature of this revolution led by Generation-Z is the powerful role of videos- which often in real-time played important active role in the unfolding of the event and bring political change. These recordings document violence, protest, and resilience, helping ensure truth, accountability, and historical memory. With video archives, readers can gain an unfiltered record of one of Bangladesh’s most defining democratic movements. At the same time- the collections document how cell phone + social media + instant video has become a new unstoppable tool  for Gen-Z and post Gen-Z revolutionaries.
* [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xchOf-QJiDU তথ‍্য-প্রমাণের ভিত্তিতে গোপন আটক কেন্দ্র উন্মোচন | Documentary of Disappearance | Interim Govt| Ekhon Channel]
